ComicInfo.Penciller: Curt Swan,John Totleben,Phil Hester,Curt Swan,Phillip Hester
ComicInfo.Summary:
Comics legend Curt Swan guest-pencils the most off-beat SWAMP THING story of recent years. When lovable hippie Chester Williams forsakes his left-wing past for the ultraconservative life of a New York City cop, the powers that be decide he's just the man to talk the Swamp Thing out of his environmentally-conscious plans for humankind. Is it an imaginary story...or a frightening glimpse of America's future?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-07-23 07:38:42. [CVDB42283]
